column2: CTO Realty Growth Inc., formerly Consolidated-Tomoka Land Co., real estate company. The Company owns income properties comprised of approximately 2.2 million square feet in diversified markets in the United States and an approximately 23% interest in Alpine Income Property Trust, Inc. (PINE), a real estate investment trust. Its segments include Income Property, Management Services, Commercial Loan Investments and Real Estate Operations. It owns approximately 31 income properties located in 11 states across the United States. Management Services segment includes a fee-based management business that is engaged in managing PINE. Commercial Loan Investments segment includes a portfolio of commercial loan investments. Real Estate Operations segment includes a portfolio of mineral interests consisting of approximately 460,000 subsurface acres in 20 counties in the state of Florida and a portfolio of mitigation credits and an interest in the Mitigation Bank joint venture (JV).
